info.description: Gets the available languages.

An array of the available languages. Can be either a `string[]` or a `{ id: string; label: string }[]`
depending on how the available languages are set in your module.
Gets the instant translated value of a key

translate<string>('hello')
translate('hello', { value: 'value' })
translate<string[]>(['hello', 'key'])
translate('hello', { }, 'en')
translate('scope.someKey', { }, 'en')

info.signature: translate<T = any>(key: TranslateParams, params: HashMap = {}, lang = this.getActiveLang()): T;

info.description: Gets the translated value of a key as observable

selectTranslate<string>('hello').subscribe(value => ...)
selectTranslate<string>('hello', {}, 'es').subscribe(value => ...)
selectTranslate<string>('hello', {}, 'todos').subscribe(value => ...)
selectTranslate<string>('hello', {}, { scope: 'todos' }).subscribe(value => ...)

info.signature: selectTranslate<T = any>(  key: TranslateParams,  params?: HashMap,  lang?: string | TranslocoScope,  _isObject = false ): Observable<T>;
translateObject<T = any>(key: TranslateObjectParams, params?: HashMap, lang = this.getActiveLang()): T | T[];

info.description: Translate the given path that returns an object
service.translateObject('path.to.object', {'subpath': { value: 'someValue'}}) => returns translated object

info.signature: translateObject<T = any>(key: string, params?: HashMap, lang?: string): T;
translateObject<T = any>(key: string[], params?: HashMap, lang?: string): T[];
translateObject<T = any>(key: TranslateParams, params?: HashMap, lang?: string): T | T[];
translateObject<T = any>(key: HashMap | Map<string, HashMap>, params?: null, lang?: string): T[];
selectTranslateObject<T = any>(  key: TranslateObjectParams,  params?: HashMap,  lang?: string ): Observable<T> | Observable<T[]>;
selectTranslateObject<T = any>(key: string, params?: HashMap, lang?: string): Observable<T>;
selectTranslateObject<T = any>(key: string[], params?: HashMap, lang?: string): Observable<T[]>;
selectTranslateObject<T = any>(key: HashMap | Map<string, HashMap>, params?: null, lang?: string): Observable<T[]>;

info.description: Gets an object of translations for a given language

getTranslation()
getTranslation('en')
getTranslation('admin-page/en')
Gets an object of translations for a given language

selectTranslation().subscribe() - will return the current lang translation
selectTranslation('es').subscribe()
selectTranslation('admin-page').subscribe() - will return the current lang scope translation
selectTranslation('admin-page/es').subscribe()
Sets or merge a given translation object to current lang

setTranslation({ ... })
setTranslation({ ... }, 'en')
setTranslation({ ... }, 'es', { merge: false } )
setTranslation({ ... }, 'todos/en', { merge: false } )

info.signature: setTranslation(translation: Translation, lang = this.getActiveLang(), options: SetTranslationOptions = {});

info.description: Sets translation key with given value

setTranslationKey('key', 'value')
setTranslationKey('key.nested', 'value')
setTranslationKey('key.nested', 'value', 'en')

info.signature: setTranslationKey(key: string, value: string, lang = this.getActiveLang());

info.description: Sets the fallback lang for the currently active language
Checks if a given string is one of the specified available languages.

True if the given string is an available language.
False if the given string is not an available language.

We always want to make sure the global lang is loaded
before loading the scope since you can access both via the pipe/directive.

info.signature: transform(key: string | null, params?: HashMap | undefined, inlineLang?: string | undefined): string;

info.description: Sets up TranslocoConfig object.

info.label: config
info.description: The partial config object to load, this is optional,

info.signature: transpile(value: any, params: HashMap = {}, translation: Translation): any;
transpile(value: any, params: HashMap = {}, translation: Translation): any;

overloads.signature: export type HashMap<T = any> = { [key: string]: T };

info.signature: static withLangs(  langs: HashMap<Translation>,  config: Partial<TranslocoConfig> = {} ): ModuleWithProviders<TranslocoTestingModule>;

overloads.signature: export type View = string | TemplateRef<any> | Type<any>;

info.description: Returns the culture language code name from the browser, e.g. "en-US"
Returns the language code name from the browser, e.g. "en"

getPipeValue('todos|scoped', 'scoped') [true, 'todos']
getPipeValue('en|static', 'static') [true, 'en']
getPipeValue('en', 'static') [false, 'en']

overloads.signature: export type AvailableLangs = string[] | { id: string; label: string }[];
export type SetTranslationOptions = { merge?: boolean; emitChange?: boolean };
export type TranslocoScope = ProviderScope | string | undefined;
function setValue(obj: any, prop: string, val: any);
function isFunction(val: any): val is Function;
function isString(val: any): val is string;
function isNumber(val: any): val is number;
function toNumber(value: number | string): number | null;
function isScopeObject(item: any): item is ProviderScope;
function hasInlineLoader(item: any): item is ProviderScope;

info.description:
Transform a date into the locale's date format.

The date expression: a `Date` object, a number
(milliseconds since UTC epoch), or an ISO string (https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime).

localizeDate(new Date(2019, 9, 7, 12, 0, 0)) // 10/7/2019
localizeDate(date, 'en-US', { dateStyle: 'medium', timeStyle: 'medium' }) // Sep 10, 2019, 10:46:12 PM
localizeDate(date) 'en-US', { timeZone: 'UTC', timeStyle: 'full' } // 7:40:32 PM Coordinated Universal Time
localizeDate(1, 'en-US', { dateStyle: 'medium' }) // Jan 1, 1970
localizeDate('2019-02-08', 'en-US', { dateStyle: 'medium' }) // Feb 8, 2019

info.signature: localizeDate(date: ValidDate, locale: Locale = this.getLocale(), options?: DateFormatOptions): string;

info.description:
Transform a number into the locale's number format according to the number type.

localizeNumber(1234567890, 'decimal') // 1,234,567,890
localizeNumber(0.5, 'percent') // 50%
localizeNumber(1000, 'currency') // $1,000.00

info.signature: localizeNumber(  value: number | string,  type: NumberTypes,  locale: Locale = this.getLocale(),  options?: Intl.NumberFormatOptions ): string;

info.description: The number display formatting type.
Allowed values with Date and Time formats
Common allowed formats for time zones
Common allowed formats for date strings
Common allowed formats for numbers
Supported Intl calender types

overloads.signature: export type ValidDate = Date | string | number;

info.description:
Transform a date into the locale's date format.

The date expression: a `Date` object,  a number
(milliseconds since UTC epoch), or an ISO string (https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime).

date | translocoDate: {} : en-US // 9/10/2019
date | translocoDate: { dateStyle: 'medium', timeStyle: 'medium' } : en-US // Sep 10, 2019, 10:46:12 PM
date | translocoDate: { timeZone: 'UTC', timeStyle: 'full' } : en-US // 7:40:32 PM Coordinated Universal Time
1 | translocoDate: { dateStyle: 'medium' } // Jan 1, 1970
'2019-02-08' | translocoDate: { dateStyle: 'medium' } // Feb 8, 2019

info.signature: transform(date: ValidDate, options: DateFormatOptions = {}, locale?: Locale);

info.description: Transform a given number into the locale's currency format.

1000000 | translocoCurrency: 'symbol' : {} : USD // $1,000,000.00
1000000 | translocoCurrency: 'name' : {} : USD // 1,000,000.00 US dollars
1000000 | translocoCurrency: 'symbol' : {minimumFractionDigits: 0 } : USD // $1,000,000

info.signature: transform(  value: number | string,  display: 'code' | 'symbol' | 'name' = 'symbol',  numberFormatOptions: NumberFormatOptions = {},  currencyCode?: Currency,  locale?: Locale ): string;

info.description: Transform a given number into the locale's currency format.

1 | translocoPercent : {} : en-US // 100%
"1" | translocoPercent : {} : en-US // 100%

info.signature: transform(value: number | string, numberFormatOptions: NumberFormatOptions = {}, locale?: Locale): string;

info.description: Transform a given number into the locale's currency format.

1234567890 | translocoDecimal: {} : en-US // 1,234,567,890
1234567890 | translocoDecimal: {useGrouping: false}: en-US // 1234567890

info.signature: transform(value: string | number, numberFormatOptions: NumberFormatOptions = {}, locale?: Locale): string;
public transform(date: Date, locale: Locale, options: DateFormatOptions): string;
public transform(  value: number | string,  type: NumberTypes,  locale: string,  options: Intl.NumberFormatOptions ): string;
transpile(value: any, params: HashMap<any> = {}, translation: Translation): any;

overloads.signature: export type MFLocale = { [locale: string]: Function } | string[] | string;
export type MaybeAsync<T = any> = Promise<T> | Observable<T> | T;
